property.name: azimuth
property.description: Specifies the apparent horizontal origin of the voice used by speech synthesizers.

value.name: URI
value.description: A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.

value.name: URI
value.description: A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.

property.name: elevation
property.description: Specifies the apparent vertical elevation of the voice used by speech synthesizers.

property.name: pause
property.description: Specifies time to pause before continuting to process the document.

property.name: pause-after

value.name: time
value.description: Time to pause before continuing after the current element.

property.description: Specifies time to pause after processing the given element, before continuting to process the document.

property.name: pause-before

value.name: time
value.description: Time to pause before continuing with the current element.

property.description: Specifies time to pause before continuting to process the given element.

property.name: pitch
property.description: Specifies pitch to be used by the speech synthesizer.

property.name: pitch-range
property.description: Specifies a pitch range to be used by the speech synthesizer.

property.name: richness
property.description: Specifies richness of the voice to be used by speech synthesizers.

property.name: speak
property.description: Specifies spoken treatment of an element by speech synthesizers.

property.name: speak-header
property.description: Specifies spoken treatment of table header by speech synthesizers.

property.name: speak-numeral
property.description: Specifies spoken treatment of numbers by speech synthesizers.

property.name: speak-punctuation
property.description: Specifies spoken treatment of punctuation by speech synthesizers.

property.name: speech-rate
property.description: Specifies the rate of speech synthesization.

property.name: stress
property.description: Specifies weight of spoken stress to be emulated by speech synthesizers.

property.name: voice-family
property.description: Specifies voice family to be used by speech synthesizers.

property.name: volume
property.description: Specifies volume for speech synthesis.

property.name: outline
property.description: Shorthand specification of ...

property.name: outline-width
property.description: Shorthand specification of ...

group.name: Paged

property.name: page-break-after

value.name: auto
value.description: Let the user agent manage page breaks.

value.name: always
value.description: Always insert a page break after this element.

value.name: avoid
value.description: Avoid inserting a page break after this element if it is possible.

property.description: Specifies page break behavior after the given element.

property.name: page-break-before

value.name: auto
value.description: Let the user agent manage page breaks.

value.name: always
value.description: Always insert a page break before this element.

value.name: avoid
value.description: Avoid inserting a page break before this element if it is possible.

property.description: Specifies page break behavior before the given element.

property.name: page-break-inside

value.name: auto
value.description: Let the user agent manage page breaks.

value.name: avoid
value.description: Avoid inserting a page break inside this element if it is possible.

property.description: Specifies page break behavior inside the given element.

group.property:
? ?
Specifies the size of ???.
size: %0 %1;
size:

property.name: background
property.description: Specifies background properties. Shorthand for individual background properties.
property.info: This property is more widely supported than the individual background properties. Besides, it's easier to read and to type!

property.name: background-attachment

value.name: fixed
value.description: Fixes the background to the viewport.

value.name: scroll
value.description: Background will scroll with the rest of the page.

property.description: Specifies background scrolling behaviour.
property.info: This property is most widely supported for BODY elements.

property.name: background-color

value.name: color
value.description: Specifies a background color in valid color syntax.

property.description: Specifies background color.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Specifies the location of a background image.

property.name: background-postion

value.name: vertical
value.description: Specifies vertical positioning. May be 'top', 'center', 'bottom', or a valid length.

value.name: horizontal
value.description: Specifies horizontal positioning. May be 'left', 'center', 'right', or a valid length.

property.description: Specifies location of background relative to the upper left corner.

property.name: background-repeat

value.name: repeat
value.description: Indicates that the background image should repeat on both the x and y axes.

value.name: repeat-x
value.description: Indicates that the background image should repeat only on the x axis (horizontally).

value.name: repeat-y
value.description: Indicates that the background image should repeat only on the y axis (vertically).

value.name: no-repeat
value.description: Indicates that the background image should not repeat on any axis.

property.description: Specifies background image tiling.

property.name: border
property.description: Shorthand specification of border width, style and color.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: Specifies width, style, and color of bottom border.

property.name: border-bottom-color

value.name: color
value.description: Specifies bottom border color in valid color syntax.

property.description: Specifies bottom border color.

property.name: border-bottom-style
property.description: Specifies bottom border style. May be 'dashed', 'dotted', 'double', 'groove', 'inset', 'outset', 'ridge', 'solid', or 'none'.

property.name: border-bottom-width
property.description: Specifies bottom border width. May be 'thin', 'medium', 'thick', or a valid length.

property.name: border-collapse

value.name: collapse
value.description: Indicates that table cell borders should be collapsed.

value.name: separate
value.description: Indicates that table cell borders should be separate.

property.description: Specifies whether or not 'padding' or a 'margin' should be displayed around table cells.

property.name: border-color
property.description: Specifies border colors.

property.name: border-left
property.description: Specifies width, style, and color of left border.

property.name: border-left-color
property.description: Specifies left border color.

property.name: border-left-style
property.description: Specifies left border style. May be 'dashed', 'dotted', 'double', 'groove', 'inset', 'outset', 'ridge', 'solid', or 'none'.

property.name: border-left-width
property.description: Specifies left border width. May be 'thin', 'medium', 'thick', or a valid length.

property.name: border-right
property.description: Specifies right border width, style, and color.

property.name: border-right-color
property.description: Specifies top border color.

property.name: border-right-style
property.description: Specifies right border style. May be 'dashed', 'dotted', 'double', 'groove', 'inset', 'outset', 'ridge', 'solid', or 'none'.

property.name: border-right-width
property.description: Specifies right border width. May be 'thin', 'medium', 'thick', or a valid length.

property.name: border-spacing
property.description: Specifies distance between table cell borders.

property.name: border-style
property.description: Specifies border styles.

property.name: border-top
property.description: Specifies width, style, and color of top border.

property.name: border-top-color
property.description: Specifies top border color.

property.name: border-top-style
property.description: Specifies top border style. May be 'dashed', 'dotted', 'double', 'groove', 'inset', 'outset', 'ridge', 'solid', or 'none'.

property.name: border-top-width
property.description: Specifies top border width. May be 'thin', 'medium', 'thick', or a valid length.

property.name: border-width
property.description: Specifies border widths.

property.name: bottom
property.description: Specifies the distance from the bottom of the viewport the element should be placed.

property.name: caption-side

value.name: top
value.description: Place caption at the top of the table.

value.name: left
value.description: Place caption at the left of the table.

value.name: right
value.description: Place caption at the right of the table.

value.name: bottom
value.description: Place caption at the bottom of the table.

property.description: Specifies the side on which table captions should be placed.

property.name: clear
property.description: Specifies on which sides other HTML elements may appear.
property.info: This property is generally used in conjunction with the float property.

property.name: clip
property.description: Specifies the clipping shape and size for an absolutely positioned element.
property.dialog: clip: rect(%_);A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.
property.info: CSS 2, and 2.1 only support rectangle clipping shapes.

property.name: color
property.description: Specifies the color in hexadecimal or RGB formats.
property.info: Hexadecimal values can be written shorthand: #f30, which is the same as #ff3300. RGB values can be in values 0-255, or percentages.

property.name: cursor

value.name: URI
value.description: A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.

value.name: n-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for top side.

value.name: ne-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for upper right corner.

value.name: e-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for right side.

value.name: se-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for lower right corner.

value.name: s-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for bottom side.

value.name: sw-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for lower left corner.

value.name: w-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for left side.

value.name: nw-resize
value.description: Use system resize cursor for upper left corner.

property.description: Specifies cursor type.

property.name: direction
property.description: Specifies text direction.

property.name: empty-cells
property.description: Specifies if empty table cells should be rendered or hidden.

property.name: float

value.name: left
value.description: Float to left side of parent box.

value.name: right
value.description: Float to right side of parent box.

property.description: Specifies positioning of an element within its enclosing parent box.
property.info: This property does not apply to positioned or generated elements.

property.name: font-family

value.name: font name
value.description: Font name. Multiple names separated by commas.

property.description: Specifies specific font(s), and/or font families to be used.
property.info: Font alternatives, and a generic font-type are strongly suggested to help user agents correctly render the document.

property.name: font-size

value.name: number
value.description: Absolute value: any valid length, or percentage.

property.description: Specifies font size.

value.name: number
value.description: Absolute value: any valid length, or percentage.

property.name: font-stretch
property.description: Specifies kerning, or spacing of letters.

property.name: font-style
property.description: Specifies font styling to be applied.

property.name: font-variant

value.name: small-caps
value.description: Caps for all letters - smaller for non-capitals.

property.description: Specifies font variant to be used.

property.name: font-weight

value.name: bold
value.desctription: Use a relatively bold font face.

value.name: bolder
value.description: Use a relatively bolder font face.

value.name: lighter
value.description: Use a relatively lighter font face.
Use the lightest font weight; absolute.
Use the second lightest font weight; absolute.
Use the third lightest font weight; absolute.
Use the medium-light font weight; absolute.
Use the medium font weight; absolute.
Use the medium-heavylightest font weight; absolute.
Use the third heaviest font weight; absolute.
Use the second heaviest font weight; absolute.
Use the third heaviest font weight; absolute.

property.description: Specifies wieght of font face.

property.name: height
property.description: Specifies an element's height.

property.name: left
property.description: Specifies distance from the left edge of the viewport or original position a positioned item should be placed.

property.name: letter-spacing
property.description: Specifies a uniform kerning value (ie., or spacing between letters).

property.name: line-height
property.description: Specifies the hight of text lines (ie., line spacing. Similar to leading).

property.name: list-style
property.description: Shorthand specification of list styles.

property.name: list-style-image

value.name: URI
value.description: A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.

property.description: Specifies an image in place of the list bullet.

property.name: list-style-type

value.name: decimal-leading-zero
value.description: Numbered bullets; standard digits with a leading 0 (01, 02, 03).

value.name: hiragana
value.description: Lettered bullets; Japanese Hiragana (あ, い, う)

value.name: hiragana-iroha
value.description: Lettered bullets; Japanese Hiragana traditional ordering (い, ろ, は)

value.name: katakana
value.description: Lettered bullets; Japanese Katakana (ア, イ, ウ)

value.name: katakana-iroha
value.description: Lettered bullets; Japanese Katakana traditional ordering (イ, ロ, ハ)

value.name: lower-alpha
value.description: Lettered bullets; lower case alphabet (a, b, c).

value.name: lower-greek
value.description: Lettered bullets; lower case Greek (α, β, γ).

value.name: lower-latin
value.description: Lettered bullets; lower case Latin (a, b, c).

value.name: lower-roman
value.description: Numbered bullets; lower case Roman numerals (i, ii, iii).

value.name: upper-alpha
value.description: Lettered bullets; upper case alphabet (A, B, C).

value.name: upper-greek
value.description: Lettered bullets; upper case Greek (Α, Β, Γ).

value.name: upper-latin
value.description: Lettered bullets; upper case Latin (A, B, C).

value.name: upper-roman
value.description: Numbered bullets; upper case Roman numerals (I,II,III).

property.description: Specifies bullet style on list items.
property.info: If suitable fonts are not installed on the user's system, some types may display properly - in particular, the Armenian, Georgian, Hebrew, CJK Ideographs, and the Japanese Kana types.

property.name: margin
property.description: Shorthand specification of margins.

property.name: margin-bottom
property.description: Specifies size of bottom margin.

property.name: margin-left
property.description: Specifies size of left margin.

property.name: margin-right
property.description: Specifies size of right margin.

property.name: margin-top
property.description: Specifies size of top margin.

property.name: max-height
property.description: Specifies maximum allowed height of an element.
property.info: This property is not properly supported on any version of Internet Explorer.

property.name: max-width
property.description: Specifies maximum allowed width of an element.
property.info: This property is not properly supported on any version of Internet Explorer.

property.name: min-height
property.description: Specifies minimum allowed height of an element.
property.info: This property is not properly supported on any version of Internet Explorer.

property.name: min-width
property.description: Specifies minimum allowed width of an element.
property.info: This property is not properly supported on any version of Internet Explorer.

property.name: overflow

value.name: visible
value.description: Completely show all overflowing child elements.

value.name: hidden
value.description: Hide overflowing parts of child elements.

value.name: scroll
value.discription: Add scrollbars to the item, activating as appropriate when a child element overflows the element.

value.name: auto
value.description: Let the user agent manage overflowing child elements.

property.description: Specifies the management of child elements which extend beyond the boundaries of the given element.

property.name: padding
property.description: Shorthand specification of box padding; ie., the space between the contents of a box, and the box's edges.

property.name: padding-top
property.description: Specifies the space between the contents of a box, and the box's top edge.

property.name: padding-right
property.description: Specifies the space between the contents of a box, and the box's right edge.

property.name: padding-bottom
property.description: Specifies the space between the contents of a box, and the box's bottom edge.

property.name: padding-left
property.description: Specifies the space between the contents of a box, and the box's left edge.

property.name: position

value.name: absolute
value.description: Remove element from document flow, and set origination point to 0 0 (upper left corner of theviewport).

value.name: fixed
value.description: Fix the position of the element to it's original placing in the viewport.

value.name: relative
value.description: Remove the element from the document flow, leaving the origination point where it was originally.

value.name: static
value.description: Fix the position of the element to it's original placing in the document.

property.description: Specifies how an element should be positioned in the document or viewport.

property.name: right
property.description: Specifies distance from the right edge of the viewport, document, or original positioning to place an element.

property.name: table-layout
property.description: ??? Specifies method of rendering table layouts.

property.name: text-decoration

value.name: line-through
value.description: Text with a line through it.

value.name: overline
value.description: Text with a line above it.

value.name: underline
value.description: Text with a line below it.

property.description: Specifies decorations to be used on the text contained in an element.

property.name: text-indent
property.description: Specifies amount by which text should be indented.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Specifies color and dimension of a text shadow.

property.name: text-transform

value.name: lowercase
value.description: Transforms the string to all lowercase.

value.name: uppercase
value.description: Transforms the string to all uppercase.

property.description: Specifies transformations to be applied to the text with an element.

property.name: top
property.description: Specifies distance from the top edge of the viewport, document, or original positioning, to place an element.

property.name: vertical-align
property.description: Specifies veritcal alignement of inline elements to each other, or text within a table cell.

property.name: visibility

value.name: collapse
value.description: Hides and removes from document flow.

value.name: hidden
value.description: Element is hidden, but not removed from document flow.

property.description: Specifies visibility of an element.

property.name: white-space

value.name: normal
value.description: Use default HTML white space rendering.

property.description: Specifies treatment of white space within an element.

property.name: width
property.description: Specifies widht of an item.

property.name: word-spacing
property.description: Specifies space between words.

property.name: z-index
property.description: Specifies position of the layers of positioned element.

value.name: URI
value.description: A Universal Resouce Identifier. Usually an URL.

property.name: display

value.name: inline
value.description: Inline display; element box contained within parent element.

value.name: block
value.description: Block display; element box contained within grandparent element, not parent.

value.name: list-item
value.description: List Item display; element box contained within parent, element is bulleted and indented as appropriate.

value.name: table
value.description: Table display: element box contained within grandparent.

property.description: Specifies display and rendering rules for associated element.
